item.title: Taproot Asset 快速上手体验
item.description: 参考学习 taproot asset 介绍: https://www.btcstudy.org/2022/04/08/how-bitcoin-taro-protocol-works/ https://www.btcstudy.org/2022/04/07/announing-Taro-a-new-protocol-for-multi-asset-bitcoin-and-lightning/ taproot asset 文档 https://docs.lightning.engineering/the-lightning-network/taproot-assets taproot asset demo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JNaryHu2mFc https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xtklaJHfKIY 安装与配置 docker docker compose/ docker desktop polar: https://github.com/jamaljsr/polar linux 下可能要注意 docker volume 没有权限读取的问题, chmod chown 一下就行 btc exporer https://github.com/janoside/btc-rpc-explorer 主要用来看一下 bitcoin regtest
